about_the_game:
Level faster, and get the Power Rank you need from Gems!

30 Gem Booster Boxes

2 Empowered Gem Boxes

2 Double Experience Potions

Lasts 1 hour, even when offline!

2 Radiant Sovereigns

Redeemable for great prizes in the Hub!

+20 Patron Points

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.7.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Two button mouse, Glyph Client and registered Trion Worlds Account

name: Trove - Fast Fortune Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista 32-bit Service Pack 2
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2XXX @ 2.0GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 @ 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Glyph Client and registered Trion Worlds Account

short_description: Level faster, and get the Power Rank you need from Gems!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
